## Emotional valence of sense words

```{r}
#| label: senses

senses <- read_csv("data/winter_2016_senses_valence.csv") %>%
  filter(
    Modality %in% c("Smell", "Taste")
  )
```

```{r}
#| label: val-dens

senses %>%
  ggplot(aes(Val)) +
  geom_density(fill = "gray", alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_rug()

```

```{r}
#| label: val-dens-mod

senses %>%
  ggplot(aes(Val, fill = Modality)) +
  geom_density(alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_rug()

```
